original: 曹魏官吏，諸葛誕的屬下。諸葛誕起兵討伐司馬昭時，派吳綱護送兒子諸葛㵾入吳為人質，以求援軍。在吳主允諾結盟後，返回壽春通知諸葛誕。
text: Cao Wei official, a subordinate of Zhuge Dan. When Zhuge gave birth to an army to fight against Sima Zhao, he sent Wu Gang to escort his son Zhuge into Wu as a hostage to ask for reinforcements. After Lord Wu promised to form an alliance, he returned to Shouchun to inform Zhuge Dan.
